name: VR Highway Car Traffic Race 3D
description:
Drive the #1 critically acclaimed VR Highway Car Traffic Race 3D game today! Get ready for the most exhilarating handheld racing experience! It must be very exciting and dangerous to weave through the traffic. Do you like to have such adrenalin Rush without any danger?VR Highway Car Traffic Race 3D has been developed as an ambitious game to make you feel this excitement. You have to destroy fast moving traffic cars on a highway. The more you destroy the traffic cars the more you get the score so achieve top scores. Collect More Bullets to Destroy More Cars And Trucks. When u Collide with the traffic cars then your car health will decrease and as soon as its reach ZERO the Highway Car Racer will end. Its one of the top car racing game on the main city highway & driving between traffic. Its fast car racing game and if you win you will be a real cars racing hero while enjoying this real racing game.
What are you waiting for? Download and install highway car racer now!

FEATURES:-
* A thriller endless racer to dodge the traffic.
* High speed driving.
* Easy controller.
* Realistic acceleration.
* Stunning 3D graphics and inspiring soundtracks.
* Amazing modern sound effects.
* Realistic physics.
* Variety of traffic cars to destroy.
